short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will collect donations for charity organizations.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gather trees through online buying or other activities, and we'll plant them for you with the help of our partners.


Discover stores that support our efforts.

Each time you search for goods, services, or online retailers, we will highlight the ones that collaborate with us, allowing your tree to grow until it is prepared for planting.


Tree gathering may be done manually or automatically.

Using our activation button, you can choose whether you want to manually engage the tree collection or use the full automatic mode, in which case our extension will automatically activate the tree collection with our partners.


Save CO2 emissions

Your and our activities will lessen our global CO2 emissions and improve the earth for future generations.
